sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROSSIANO a city of Italy, in the province of Calabria Citeriore, and the kingdom of Naples. It stands on the sea-shore, between the rivers Lucena and Celano. It is the see of a bishop, and has a cathedral, and twenty-three other churches, of which nine belong to the same number of monasteries or nunneries. The inhabitants amount to 7700.
